titleStmt.title: The blessed'st birth that euer was: or, The blessed birth of our Lord and Sauior Iesus Christ Preached at the Fleet, the 25. of Decem: A. Dom. 1627. By Henry Greenvvood preacher of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Greenwood, Henry, b. 1544 or 5.

titleStmt.title: The blessed'st birth that euer was: or, The blessed birth of our Lord and Sauior Iesus Christ Preached at the Fleet, the 25. of Decem: A. Dom. 1627. By Henry Greenvvood preacher of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Greenwood, Henry, b. 1544 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: By E. Purslow for H. B[ell] and M. B[ell] and are to be so'd [sic] by Iohn Grismond at the signe of the Gun in Ivie-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A¹² B C⁴; reimposed with altered signatures (except for B2, which is retained on P9) as O9-Q6 of STC 12331.5.--STC.
Running title reads: The blessed birth of the Lord Iesus.
Misbound; quire C bound after title page.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library.
